_description: Encoder binary exists but fails validation (not toon_rust). ValueError fallback.

encoder.message: TOON_BIN resolved to 'node_toon_cli', which does not look like toon_rust (expected tru). Refusing to run a non-toon_rust encoder.

meta.toon_error: TOON_BIN resolved to 'node_toon_cli', which does not look like toon_rust (expected tru). Refusing to run a non-toon_rust encoder.
